name: SCHOOLBOYS! AYUMI
description:
It is another summer.
The sun shining, the cicada singing.
Just like avoid remaining memory of summer vocation, the boys keep going on their own path.

Start from today, Misaki school entered second semester, with Sports ceremony and Music festival. What will they find, how will they do when they had a long time not seeing their classmates and teachers and, which path will they choose for their school life?

Time past, things remain. All in all, they will have another new page in their life.

"Let us follow!"

  • 3 chapters with more than 10 hours gameplay
  • 200+ CG images
  • AYUMI (SLG like) mode and STORY (AVG) mode
  • 40+ characters
